name: Desert Bandit
description:
Our submission for the ZFX Action XVI game jam. We decided to realize not one but three of the given restrictions. Therefore, the game

  • uses only 4 colors
  • has a resolution of 80x60 pixels
  • can be played with just one button

The game is a horizontal shmup with nearly 20 waves of (steadily becoming more dangerous) enemies. Press an arbitrary button to thrust and shoot.

Have fun!
